output:
How can I say when I see through Your eyes, cold and blue?
Raise my heart while I like to hold You I submit to Your will
Rise, rise, rise, rise
What can I say when the moon shines on you? Lighting up your face against the truth
Hidden high, the mask worn by you Beautiful as a dream came true
Rise, rise, rise, rise
And you lost me as in old memories That you never need
Deleted from the dream you never dreamed Waiting for the right time to rise
Rise, rise, rise, rise
